## Contributing Factors

| Factor | Impact Level | Description |
|--------|-------------|-------------|
| Part-time Work | High | 58.6% of women vs 17.9% of men work part-time |
| Career Breaks | Medium | Average 3.7 years break for women after children |
| Industry Choice | High | Women: 76% in service sector, Men: 68% |
| Leadership Roles | High | Women hold 34.5% of management positions |

|------------|----------------|-------------|
| Pay Transparency | Partial | Mandatory |
| Parental Leave | 14 weeks | 20 weeks |
| Gender Quotas | 30% boards | 40% boards |
